description: This file defines the AdminUsersManagementScreen widget for a Flutter app, providing an admin interface for user and role management, with UI components and permission checks.

classes.name: AdminUsersManagementScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the admin users management screen, including route navigation and permission checking.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A private widget for rendering styled section headers in the admin UI.

classes.name: _Lined
classes.description: A private widget for rendering list items with a check icon and styled container.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for AdminUsersManagementScreen, including permission check and conditional display of content.

methods.name: _Header.build
methods.description: Builds a styled header container with an icon and title.

methods.name: _Lined.build
methods.description: Builds a list item with icon and text styled with glow effect.
